text:
Log4J 1.3 added new methods for parameterized logging, like:

logger.debug("User name: {}", user);

that used a message formatter with a syntax similar (but not compatible) with java.text.MessageFormatter.

This enhancement adds two companions for log4j 1.2.x that add similar capabilities to deployed log4j 
versions, logmf uses java.text.MessageFormatter while logsf uses a formatter compatible with log4j 1.3.
creator: carnold@apache.org
